Header: Bangladesh DSCSC Team Goes to Kandy
Content: The 26-member student officer delegation of the Bangladesh Defence Services Command & Staff College (DSCSC) during their recent tour in Sri Lanka paid their homage to the Temple of Tooth Relic (Sri Dalada Maligawa) on Wednesday (28). The delegation was warmly welcomed by the Senior Officers of the 11 Division on the directions of the Commander, Security forces - Central, Major General Ruwan de Silva. They paid homage and made offerings to the temple. The delegation left Sri Lanka on Saturday (1) morning.
